title: Casual Ranked 5s Team [LFM] (AU)
body:
Hello, 

We are currently two players looking to form a team. 
We are searching for players for the roles: Jungle, Top, Support
Requirements: Must be 18 years or older, must have access to voice communication (skype, mic), must be willing and interested to learn and improve and of course, have fun.

We are looking to be a fun team, but at the same time we'd still like to win. That said, we don't expect to reach high diamond, master or challenger, but we would still like to explore the team aspects of the game; things like building team compositions and strategies. We will also occasionally review our replays as a team and discuss the pros and cons of our play. 

How to apply: Contact us IGNs - VoidGiraffe, Remembrance. We will play a few games with you, and see if we click. 

Hope to see you all soon,
Remembrance

replies.body: Plat 5 supp main can play mid and adc well as well. also over 20

Hey Mate,

Really keen to join a competitive fun team with mature people i am 28 and love the game play a lot looking to take it a bit further and see what we can do with an awesome team.
Im keen. main support G2 IGN:Hysteriix {{item:2043}}
yo hit me up of league and sus me out. im looking for a team. SnapperScalez is my username
hey i was silver 5 last season, now bronze 2, comfortable with any of those positions, but probably more with top and sup than jg
